text: I was just trying to do the right thing
you know because well I felt responsible
my family their sons their got to set a
good example and I'm not the most
organized of parents I'll be the first
to admit you know a lot of other parents
seem way more organized they asked me
questions to which I do not know the
answer things like how old is your son
now and I are oh nine thirteen twenty
three it's an odd number I think
and right now I'm supposed to be
photographing his sites of historical
interest for his school history project
but so far all I've got is this now
all that is is a futile act of defiance
but it did feel good I have to say while
I was on the island of Alton II I
thought I'll get something here and I'll
get neolithic settlement standing stones
but a terrible childish compunction took
over and all I got was that so
now you'd have done the same this is now
my passport photo I'm quite proud of
that but while I drop my son off at
school the other parents are so much
more organised it's a different world
you know big turn up and the kids are
immaculate the hairs cold
Blazers press tie on to matching shoes
how do you do that here's your lunch
organic couscous and some wheatgrass
juice thank you mama and as they waft
towards the school they present them
with a and a laminated agenda for the
rest of their lives and I turn up with
my son it's a different scenario we're
just goofing towards the school late
come on he's wrapped to the dog blanket
held on with a Stranglers lapel badge
from 1981 I'm cracking open a Glade
plugin with a claw hammer and putting it
in his pocket to get the smell of cat
piss out of his blazer there's your
lunch pepper army and a Red Bull there
you go
it's all your food groups represented
his homeworks on the back of a pizza box
I look down he's only got one shoe on so
I draw a shoe on his bare foot with a
marker pen I've forgotten his hockey
kids I'll give him a 9 iron in an onion
yeah
bag of harrybo and a sleeping bag case
I'll forget that pickup up again and
we're returning the school hamster which
hasn't made it over the weekend the cats
had it so we've made a decoy I have a
scotch egg and four cigarette butts yeah
put that right down in the cage cover it
up with straw if anyone asks it was like
that when we found
[Applause]
you
